ThighsLVLyingHipAdduction.name: Lever Lying Hip Adduction
ThighsLVLyingHipAdduction.preparation: Sit in machine with legs outside of vertical center pads. If available, place heels on foot bars. Lie back on back pad. Disengage and pull lever brace to position legs apart until slight stretch is felt. Engage lever into locked position. Lie back and grasp bars to sides.
ThighsLVLyingHipAdduction.execution: Move legs together. Return and repeat.
ThighsLVLyingHipAdduction.comments: Mount machine with leg levers together. Use lever to extend legs apart. See Spot Reduction Myth.

ThighsLVSeatedHipAdduction.name: Lever Seated Hip Adduction
ThighsLVSeatedHipAdduction.preparation: Sit in machine with legs outside of vertical center pads. If available, place heels on foot bars. Disengage and pull lever brace to position legs apart until slight stretch is felt. Engage lever into locked position. Lie back and grasp bars to sides.
ThighsLVSeatedHipAdduction.execution: Move legs together. Return and repeat.
ThighsLVSeatedHipAdduction.comments: Mount machine with leg levers together. Use lever to extend legs apart. See Spot Reduction Myth.

ThighsLVStandHipAdduction.name: Lever Standing Hip Adduction
ThighsLVStandHipAdduction.preparation: Adjust platform so lever fulcrum is same height as hip articulation. Adjust roller pad to side position. Face machine and grasp bars to sides. Place inside of thigh on roller pad and remain standing on supporting leg.
ThighsLVStandHipAdduction.execution: Move leg toward and across supporting leg Return and repeat. Reposition roller pad lever and continue with opposite leg.
